dcterms:description: Brodatz dataset is included 112 classes of textures. In this dataset, each class is included one texture image in size of 512×512. In order to provide unbiased test and train set, 12 classes are chosen randomly. In order to provide satisfied number of train and test images for classifying, each one is cropped to windows in size of 128×128 and overlapped by size 64.
dcterms:title: Brodatz

dcterms:description: Outex dataset is used for texture classification and is considered a popular database in texture analysis research.
dcterms:title: Outex
